title: Netflix Clone
description: A Netflix clone built with React.js, Sass, and TMDB API.

title: Shoorty a link shortner website
description: Introducing Shoorty: The Elegance of Brevity. Beyond link shortening, it offers a unique twist. Seamlessly embedded within its mechanism is the power to promote your YouTube channels. Security and ease merge through JSON Web Tokens (JWT). EJS lends its magic to the dynamic frontend, promising a smooth ride. Unshackle your URLs from excess - Shoorty is here.
issue: This web project, unfortunately, is currently experiencing downtime due to the discontinuation of the free hosting service provided by Heroku. As a result, the project is temporarily inaccessible until suitable hosting alternatives are explored and implemented.

title: Todo App
description: This project was made just for practicing purposes and that's mean it does not have a professional design, have a look at the source code. and leave a star if you like it.

title: Rewayati - Light Novel Website
description: Rewayati is a light novel website created with two versions (Next.js & Sveltekit).
issue: Currently the novel website i was scrapping does not exist anymore so yeah until i have time then i will look for some website to replace it with.

title: MitAnime - Anime Website
description: MitAnime is an anime website for arabic translated anime, created using MERN Stack.

title: ISTA Presence
description:
Introducing ISTA Presence - A Project by the Talented Team of NACHAT Ayoub, ZAARAOUI Mustapha, ABODO Hatim, and OUAKILI Badreddine.
We are proud to present ISTA Presence, a website meticulously crafted using Laravel. Our goal was to create a convenient solution for teachers and the principal at ISTA(Specialized Institute of Applied Technologies) to efficiently track and record trainees' attendance. With ISTA Presence, teachers can effortlessly note the presence of trainees, while the principal can easily access and export weekly attendance data. Our project aims to streamline attendance management, enhancing efficiency and promoting a seamless learning environment at ISTA.

title: Novel Universe
description: Novel Universe is an innovative online platform where aspiring authors can share their original novels, fostering a community of writers and readers. The platform features a unique submission process, interactive reader-author interactions, and a range of features that enhance the writing and reading experience.

title: DevHive Forum
description: DevHive Forum is a web application that allows users to ask and answer questions about programming topics. It is similar to Stack Overflow, but with a more modern and user-friendly interface. The project API is built using laravel and in the frontend react.js but currently only the frontend is still under development.
issue: Unfortunately, the frontend is not finished yet.

title: Match Colored Balls!
description: a simple game where you use your brain to move balls one each time until you match all colored balls.
